I am grateful that my Congressional colleagues and I were able to bear witness to this historical horror.

We must never forget the millions that lost their lives on that treacherous transatlantic journey, and together we will fight to ensure that history does not repeat itself. pic.twitter.com/OJ26uj9B08

As a part of the delegation, we visited the Elmina & Cape Coast Castles. But these were no castles — they were dungeons, where slaves were often forced to lie in their own excrement before they were sent across the ocean to be condemned to a life bondage. pic.twitter.com/ECwGA3DQ5Z

I recently traveled to Ghana with @SpeakerPelosi and several #BlackCaucus members to observe the 400th Anniversary of the first African slaves landing in America.
